metadata.title: CVE-2021-30809 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in Safari 15, tvOS 15, watchOS 8, iOS 15 and iPadOS 15.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30809` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.33.90-1ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
